string.name: name
string.value: Deliver the Tattered Map to Black Bark
I wonder what it is that Bartol wants me to do?
I should deliver this #bTattered Map#k to #bBlack Bark#k in the #bCentral Conference Room of The Nautilus#k.
I've delivered the Tattered Map to Black Bark.
First, give this ripped piece of the map to Black Bark.

This map was found in the treasure chest that was discovered yesterday, and... I think Black Bark would really love this. Who knows, this map may lead to lots of treasures you know. Black Bark is always at the #bmeeting room in the middle hallway of The Nautilus#k, so go see him.
Do the three favors I asked you to do, and you'll get the Warp Card. Keep going!
You don't feel like doing it anymore?
Bartol told you to give this map to you? Ohh, so this is a very old map.

In fact, it is so ancient that the way they used symbols and outlines here looks like this map is at least a few hundred years ago. This really is making me feel excited about the maps. Hahaha, thank you so much for the find, and tell Bartol I said hello, too.
Please give this map to Black Bark.
Are you here to learn how to read the map from me?
You lost it, right? I just picked these off the floor, you know. Don't lose it, because it's a very precious item, and give it to Black Bark.
